speaker: CYMBELINE
text_entry: SCENE II. Another room in the palace.

speaker: CYMBELINE
text_entry: Enter PISANIO, with a letter

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: How? of adultery? Wherefore write you not

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: What monster's her accuser? Leonatus,

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: O master! what a strange infection

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: Is fall'n into thy ear! What false Italian,

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: As poisonous-tongued as handed, hath prevail'd

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: On thy too ready hearing? Disloyal! No:

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: She's punish'd for her truth, and undergoes,

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: More goddess-like than wife-like, such assaults

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: As would take in some virtue. O my master!

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: Thy mind to her is now as low as were

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: Thy fortunes. How! that I should murder her?

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: Upon the love and truth and vows which I

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: Have made to thy command? I, her? her blood?

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: If it be so to do good service, never

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: Let me be counted serviceable. How look I,

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: That I should seem to lack humanity

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: so much as this fact comes to?

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: Reading

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: 'Do't: the letter

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: that I have sent her, by her own command

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: Shall give thee opportunity.' O damn'd paper!

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: Black as the ink that's on thee! Senseless bauble,

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: Art thou a feodary for this act, and look'st

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: So virgin-like without? Lo, here she comes.

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: I am ignorant in what I am commanded.

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: Enter IMOGEN

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: How now, Pisanio!

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: Madam, here is a letter from my lord.

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: Who? thy lord? that is my lord, Leonatus!

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: O, learn'd indeed were that astronomer

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: That knew the stars as I his characters;

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: He'ld lay the future open. You good gods,

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: Let what is here contain'd relish of love,

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: Of my lord's health, of his content, yet not

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: That we two are asunder; let that grieve him:

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: Some griefs are med'cinable; that is one of them,

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: For it doth physic love: of his content,

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: All but in that! Good wax, thy leave. Blest be

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: You bees that make these locks of counsel! Lovers

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: And men in dangerous bonds pray not alike:

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: Though forfeiters you cast in prison, yet

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: You clasp young Cupid's tables. Good news, gods!

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: Reads

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: 'Justice, and your father's wrath, should he take me

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: in his dominion, could not be so cruel to me, as

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: you, O the dearest of creatures, would even renew me

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: with your eyes. Take notice that I am in Cambria,

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: at Milford-Haven: what your own love will out of

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: this advise you, follow. So he wishes you all

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: happiness, that remains loyal to his vow, and your,

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: increasing in love,

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: LEONATUS POSTHUMUS.'

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: O, for a horse with wings! Hear'st thou, Pisanio?

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: He is at Milford-Haven: read, and tell me

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: How far 'tis thither. If one of mean affairs

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: May plod it in a week, why may not I

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: Glide thither in a day? Then, true Pisanio,--

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: Who long'st, like me, to see thy lord; who long'st,--

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: let me bate,-but not like me--yet long'st,

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: But in a fainter kind:--O, not like me;

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: For mine's beyond beyond--say, and speak thick;

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: Love's counsellor should fill the bores of hearing,

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: To the smothering of the sense--how far it is

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: To this same blessed Milford: and by the way

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: Tell me how Wales was made so happy as

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: To inherit such a haven: but first of all,

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: How we may steal from hence, and for the gap

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: That we shall make in time, from our hence-going

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: And our return, to excuse: but first, how get hence:

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: Why should excuse be born or e'er begot?

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: We'll talk of that hereafter. Prithee, speak,

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: How many score of miles may we well ride

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: 'Twixt hour and hour?

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: One score 'twixt sun and sun,

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: Madam, 's enough for you:

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: Aside

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: and too much too.

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: Why, one that rode to's execution, man,

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: Could never go so slow: I have heard of

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: riding wagers,

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: Where horses have been nimbler than the sands

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: That run i' the clock's behalf. But this is foolery:

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: Go bid my woman feign a sickness; say

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: She'll home to her father: and provide me presently

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: A riding-suit, no costlier than would fit

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: A franklin's housewife.

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: Madam, you're best consider.

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: I see before me, man: nor here, nor here,

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: Nor what ensues, but have a fog in them,

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: That I cannot look through. Away, I prithee;

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: Do as I bid thee: there's no more to say,

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: Accessible is none but Milford way.

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: Exeunt
